Descriptif: ID of the point as defined by the INSEE number
column5: nnn = number of the municipality (ddnnn = Insee code)

Descriptif: latitude in degrees
longitude in degrees
date and time of the production of the data in UTC
date and time of data-base insertion of the data in UTC
date and time of validity of the data in UTC
air temperature at 2 meters above the ground in Kelvin degrees
air temperature of dew point at 2 meters above the ground in Kelvin degrees
hourly maximum of air temperature at 2 meters above the ground in Kelvin degrees
hourly minimum of air temperature at 2 meters above the ground in Kelvin degrees
hourly relative humidity at 2 meters
hourly maximum relative humidity at 2 meters
hourly minimum relative humidity at 2 meters
mean wind direction at 10 meters above the ground in degrees
mean wind speed at 10 meters above the ground in m/s
hourly mean wind gust direction at 10 meters above the ground in degrees
hourly mean wind gust speed at 10 meters above the ground over the previous 1H in m/s
hourly instant wind gust direction at 10 meters above the ground in degrees
hourly instant wind gust speed at 10 meters above the ground over the previous 1H in m/s
all precipitation over the previous 1H in mm
temperature at 10 centimeters below the ground in Kelvin degrees
temperature at 20 centimeters below the ground in Kelvin degrees
temperature at 50 centimeters below the ground in Kelvin degrees
temperature at 1 meter below the ground in Kelvin degrees
horizontal visibility in meters
ground state code
total depth of snow cover in meters
total nebulosity in octas
sunshine duration over the previous 1H
hourly global radiation in J/m2
station pressure in Pa
sea level pressure in Pa
